name: Multi Reindeer Christmas Jumper (Blue) - Unisex
description:
DELIVERY TIMES (UK Mainland)

  • Monday to Thursday before 11am - Delivered next working day
  • Friday before 11am - Delivered Monday
  • Friday after 11am to Monday before 11am - Delivered Tuesday

    • UK Postage Prices

  • 1st Item £5.50
  • with others £2.00 each

    New for 2013 our Multi Reindeer Christmas jumper is a fair isle style knit. The all over repeat pattern features reindeers and forest trees to create a more traditional looking Christmas jumper. The complementary colours of icicle blue and off white make this garment ideal for the more fashionable Christmas jumper fan. Knitted using 85% acrylic and 15% wool, this jumper is soft and durable.

    All our Christmas jumpers are sent by signed for delivery. Items DISPATCHED in time for Christmas (we cannot be held responsible for delivery delays due to weather conditions).

name: Boxing Day Mash Up Christmas Jumper - Unisex
description:
Postage Prices

  • 1st Item by Signed Delivery £6.50
  • each extra item £1.50 each

    • Items priced per individual garment

    So how do you combat the post-Christmas blues? Stay festive of course, ignore the mountain of boxes, piles of discarded Christmas wrapping paper, sorting the recycling and continuously stacking the dishwasher and instead have a Boxing Day Mash Up. Ring round your nearest and dearest request they bring all their festive left overs and don that Cheesy Christmas novelty jumper bought for them by Great Aunt Edna. And you, you will be king for the day in your bright, garish, soft and warm Boxing Day MashUp Jumper.

    Featuring more colours then Joseph's technicoloured dream coat this Christmas Jumper will brighten up any Christmas Jumper party. This super soft knitted colourful Cheesy Christmas Jumper, is a unisex piece of fashion history and makes the perfect gift for you or a loved one. The jumper is a Christmas mash up of reindeer's, snowflakes, tree's, snowmen and candy canes and is the most colourful Christmas Jumper we have ever dared to make. Do you dare wear it?

    The jumper is made of 85% acrylic yarn and 15% wool for both comfort and durability. The Christmas jumper can be machine washed with care. Once washed allow to and hang dry. Please do not iron or tumble dry.

    All our Christmas jumpers are sent by signed for delivery. Items DISPATCHED within 1 working day by next day delivery (we cannot be held responsible for delivery delays due to weather conditions).

name: Christmas Tree LED Lighted Knitted Christmas Jumper Black - Unisex
description:
Postage Prices

  • 1st Item by Signed Delivery £6.50
  • each extra item £1.50 each

    • This festive Christmas jumper features red and white diamante baubles, embroidered stars and small led lights embedded into the garment which flash on and off once activated by the small hidden switch inside the jumper.

    During the day the natural light reflects off the red and white diamante baubles. But it's at night when this Christmas jumper comes to life! Dim the room lights and flick the switch (hidden on the inside of the garment) to activate. The Christmas tree then comes to life with the flashing multi coloured lights. Please beware that this Christmas jumper will grab attention at your Christmas party or round the dinner table on Christmas Day.

    The LED lighting system is battery powered and can be replaced if needed. The jumper is made of 80% acrylic yarn and 20% wool for both comfort and durability. The Christmas jumper can be Dry Cleaned or hand washed with care. Once washed allow to and hang dry. Please do not machine wash, iron or tumble dry.

    All our Christmas jumpers are sent by signed for delivery. Items DISPATCHED within 2-5 working days (we cannot be held responsible for delivery delays due to weather conditions).

    This festive Christmas jumper features red and white diamante baubles, embroidered stars and small lights embedded into the garment which flash on and off once activated by the small hidden switch inside the jumper.

    During the day the natural light reflects off the red and white diamante baubles. But it's at night when this Christmas jumper comes to life! Dim the room lights and flick the switch (hidden on the inside of the garment) to activate. The Christmas tree then comes to life with the flashing multi coloured lights. Please beware that this Christmas jumper will grab attention at your Christmas party or round the dinner table on Christmas Day.

    The lighting system is battery powered (included) and can be replaced if needed. The jumper is made of 85% acrylic yarn and 15% wool for both comfort and durability. The Christmas jumper can be hand washed with care. Please do not submerge the battery pack at the bottom of the jumper. Once washed allow to and hang dry. Please do not machine wash, iron or tumble dry.

    All our Christmas jumpers are sent by signed for delivery. Items DISPATCHED within 1 working day by next day delivery (we cannot be held responsible for delivery delays due to weather conditions).

name: Sleigh Ride Flashing Lights Christmas Jumper - Unisex
description:
Postage Prices

  • 1st Item by Signed Delivery £6.50
  • each extra item £1.50 each

    • Items priced per individual garment

    Imagine your entrance to this year's Christmas Jumper Party with the room lights down low, the Christmas music been played and the smell of Christmas tree pine, cinnamon and mince pies wafting in the air.

    Everyone's heads turn to see you enter the room and wonder what Christmas jumper your wearing this year. Is it the vintage jumper, the fair isle Christmas jumper or the safe mass produced high street jumper? NO! Its the 'Light-up Sleigh Ride' Christmas Jumper by Cheesy Christmas Jumpers You then flick the switch to activate the lights, and the crowd goes wild. Cheers, whoops and admiring glances greet you. It's finally your turn and you now have the Christmas jumper to impress any Christmas Jumper Party.
  • 50+ lights
  • Silver flecked knitted jumper
  • Hidden activation switch
  • Embroidered sleigh and reindeers

    • The LED lighting system is battery powered (included) and can be replaced if needed. The jumper is made of 85% acrylic yarn and 15% wool for both comfort and durability. The Christmas jumper can be hand washed with care. Please do not submerge the battery pack at the bottom of the jumper. Once washed allow to and hang dry. Please do not machine wash, iron or tumble dry.

    All our Christmas jumpers are sent by signed for delivery. Items DISPATCHED within 1 working day by next day delivery (we cannot be held responsible for delivery delays due to weather conditions).
